DelegatedPersonal.description: Allows the app to read all the short notes a sign-in user has access to.
DelegatedPersonal.longDescription: Read short notes of the signed-in user

DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to read all the short notes a sign-in user has access to.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Read short notes of the signed-in user

Application.description: Allows the app to read all the short notes without a signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.description: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete short notes of a signed-in user.
DelegatedPersonal.longDescription: Read, create, edit, and delete short notes of the signed-in user

DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete short notes of a signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Read, create, edit, and delete short notes of the signed-in user

Application.description: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete all the short notes without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Read, create, edit, and delete all users' short notes
